name: Remove Duplicates
semantic_context: Delete items with matching field values
natural_language_description: 这是 Remove Duplicates 节点。主要用于: Delete items with matching field values

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: removeDuplicateInputItems
available_options: Remove Items Repeated Within Current Input (值: removeDuplicateInputItems) - Remove duplicates from incoming items
Remove Items Processed in Previous Executions (值: removeItemsSeenInPreviousExecutions) - Deduplicate items already seen in previous executions
Clear Deduplication History (值: clearDeduplicationHistory) - Wipe the store of previous items

compare.name: compare
compare.description: The fields of the input items to compare to see if they are the same
compare.natural_language_description: 参数名: Compare | 作用: The fields of the input items to compare to see if they are the same | 默认值: allFields

fieldsToExclude.name: fieldsToExclude
fieldsToExclude.description: Fields in the input to exclude from the comparison
fieldsToExclude.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields To Exclude | 作用: Fields in the input to exclude from the comparison

fieldsToCompare.name: fieldsToCompare
fieldsToCompare.description: Fields in the input to add to the comparison
fieldsToCompare.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields To Compare | 作用: Fields in the input to add to the comparison

logic.name: logic
logic.description: How to select input items to remove by comparing them with key values previously processed
logic.natural_language_description: 参数名: Keep Items Where | 作用: How to select input items to remove by comparing them with key values previously processed | 默认值: removeItemsWithAlreadySeenKeyValues
available_options: Value Is New (值: removeItemsWithAlreadySeenKeyValues) - Remove all input items with values matching those already processed
Value Is Higher than Any Previous Value (值: removeItemsUpToStoredIncrementalKey) - Works with incremental values, removes all input items with values up to the stored value
Value Is a Date Later than Any Previous Date (值: removeItemsUpToStoredDate) - Works with date values, removes all input items with values up to the stored date

dedupeValue.name: dedupeValue
dedupeValue.description: Use an input field (or a combination of fields) that has a unique ID value
dedupeValue.natural_language_description: 参数名: Value to Dedupe On | 作用: Use an input field (or a combination of fields) that has a unique ID value | 提示: The input field value to compare between items | (必填项)

incrementalDedupeValue.name: incrementalDedupeValue
incrementalDedupeValue.description: Use an input field (or a combination of fields) that has an incremental value
incrementalDedupeValue.natural_language_description: 参数名: Value to Dedupe On | 作用: Use an input field (or a combination of fields) that has an incremental value | 提示: The input field value to compare between items, an incremental value is expected

dateDedupeValue.name: dateDedupeValue
dateDedupeValue.description: Use an input field that has a date value in ISO format
dateDedupeValue.natural_language_description: 参数名: Value to Dedupe On | 作用: Use an input field that has a date value in ISO format | 提示: The input field value to compare between items, a date is expected

mode.name: mode
mode.description: How you want to modify the key values stored on the database. None of these modes removes input items.
mode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Mode | 作用: How you want to modify the key values stored on the database. None of these modes removes input items. | 默认值: cleanDatabase
available_options: Clean Database (值: cleanDatabase) - Clear all values stored for a key in the database

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: disableDotNotation (值: None) - Whether to disallow referencing child fields using `parent.child` in the field name
removeOtherFields (值: None) - Whether to remove any fields that are not being compared. If disabled, will keep the values from the first of the duplicates.
scope (值: None) - If set to ‘workflow,’ key values will be shared across all nodes in the workflow. If set to ‘node,’ key values will be specific to this node.
